original_text: ‘Son of man, listen to what Israel's people are saying about you! They say, “The things that you see in your vision will not happen for many years. It will be a long time before his messages become true.”
korean_text: 인자야 이스라엘 족속의 말이 그가 보는 묵시는 여러 날 후의 일이라 그가 멀리 있는 때에 대하여 예언하였다 하느니라

sentences.original_text: listen to what Israel's people are saying
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 너에 대해 말하는 것을 들어라

sentences.original_text: The things that you see in your vision
will not happen for many years
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 해 동안 일어나지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: It will be a long time
